Map020.Event[123].Page[0].list.message[1: "I'll stick with you guys for sure!"

"Don't let the dungeon have its way with you. Bye."

foolish heroics only lead to one kind of destiny."
Moonless can't pick up the sword. Moonless shakes its head

before pulling the sword. Just so you are safe.
